name: Running Through Russia
summary:
Wanna some russian memes? We'll provide it!
Running Throung Russia - infinite 2D-runner game. Jump over bears, drink different beverages and see the effect!
Run in three different worlds and meet new evemies right here!
Features:
Three different worlds with their enemies and features.
Different beverages with different effects.
Skins for your character.
Thematic updates.
Features suggested by you. Yes, YOU!
How far can you run? How many can you drink? Fill your mind with russian atmosphere!
Warning!
The game does not carry any connotations, and do not intend to offend anyone. The game is created only for entertainment.
Any similarities to real world are accidents.
The game does not relate to reality.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 开发商: Spell Helix

  • 发行日期: 2017/5/22
  • 售价: ¥6
